EmailTemplate.name: VENDOME.vendome
EmailTemplate.subject: Correct FFA (Forward Freight Agent) / consignee for Honeywell Aerospace Vendôme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Aerospace Vendôme 18, boulevard de l’Industrie 41100 Vendôme, France
July 2, 2015
Dear Honeywell Customer,
As you are aware, effective 26 June, our Aerospace site in Vendôme began operations as a new legal entity – Honeywell Aerospace Vendôme (HAV).
At Vendôme, as at all Honeywell sites, our goal is always to create a more efficient and effective procurement experience for you.
Going forward, to avoid any interruptions to the flow of your shipments,it’s important you use the correct FFA (Forward Freight Agent) / consignee for Honeywell Aerospace Vendôme. The correct FFA / consignee is:
Véronique GALLON or François LE GALL
DHL GLOBAL FORWARDING (France)
DMA DEFENSE IMPORT
ZONE CARGO 4
27 RUE DE LA BELLE BORNE
93290 TREMBLAY EN FRANCE
TEL +33 (0) 1.49.19 .40.89
Email : veronique.gallon@dhl.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/A50G00QI20ZG50000q0U00X>
Email : françois.legall2@dhl.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/Q05X00I0QV2q00Z5G00H000>
If you have any questions on this point, or any aspect of logistics, please contact me using the information below. Additionally, please share this communication and future information with others in your organization as needed.
We will continue to look for ways to make it easier and more efficient for you to do business with Honeywell Aerospace Vendôme. Thank you for your confidence and support.
Kind regards,
Philippe Comes
Logistics Manager
Honeywell Aerospace Vendôme
Philippe.Comes@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/tGX02005Q00qI00ZI00005W>
+33 (0) 6.83.97.20.58
